title: Elvis Costello Announces Early Songs Tour
description: In June and July, Costello and the Imposters will play songs from My Aim Is True, This Year’s Model, and other early classics
author: Walden Green
excerpt: In June and July, Costello and the Imposters will play songs from My Aim Is True, This Year’s Model, and other early classics
text: Elvis Costello has announced 2025 tour dates where he’ll play music from the early years of his career. On the June and July stops of the Radio Soul! Tour, Costello and the Imposters will play songs taken from 1977’s My Aim Is True, 1978’s This Year’s Model, 1986’s King of America, and other early classics, pledging not to go any later than September 1986’s Blood & Chocolate. See the tour dates below.These days, the Imposters’ lineup includes Steve Nieve, Pete Thomas, Davey Faragher, and guitarist Charlie Sexton. Costello will begin 2025 with shows featuring Nieve, fiddler Eleanor Whitmore, double bassist Tony Garnier, cornetist Shaye Cohn, and Uilleann pipe player Sean McKeon.Read the new Sunday Review of Elvis Costello & the Attractions’ Imperial Bedroom.All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
Elvis Costello has announced 2025 tour dates where he’ll play music from the early years of his career. On the June and July stops of the Radio Soul! Tour, Costello and the Imposters will play songs taken from 1977’s My Aim Is True, 1978’s This Year’s Model, 1986’s King of America, and other early classics, pledging not to go any later than September 1986’s Blood & Chocolate. See the tour dates below.

These days, the Imposters’ lineup includes Steve Nieve, Pete Thomas, Davey Faragher, and guitarist Charlie Sexton. Costello will begin 2025 with shows featuring Nieve, fiddler Eleanor Whitmore, double bassist Tony Garnier, cornetist Shaye Cohn, and Uilleann pipe player Sean McKeon.

Read the new Sunday Review of Elvis Costello & the Attractions’ Imperial Bedroom.

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Elvis Costello: Radio Soul!: The Early Songs of Elvis Costello Tour

Elvis Costello:
